main.name: Colin Hayes
main.description: I'm a fourth-year college student pursuing a B.S. in Computer Science and a Minor in Mathematics, looking for a full-time position as a software engineer or closely related field after I graduate in December of 2020
main.bio: I'm an aspiring software developer who's about to graduate college this December. Outside of work and school I like building things, whether it's with wood or wires or maybe both, and being outside playing golf or running.
main.contactmessage: Send me a message if you have any questions and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

education.degree: B.S. in Computer Science, Minor in Mathematics

description: Davenport Central Golf Team Varsity Captain (2014-2017)

work.title: Web Developer Intern
description: Developed full-stack web applications using Squarespace and HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with little need for supervision or guidance on day to day tasks.
Gathered client requirements in order to ensure that the final product suited business and design needs.
Participated in sales calls in order to better understand the marketability of the product.
Some projects can be seen in the companyâ€™s portfolio: https://www.squarespace.com/designer/profile/3579170

work.title: Yard Worker
description: Ensured all bases were covered throughout the lumber, filling in wherever needed it by being cross trained in the board shed, garden center, and receiving departments.

work.title: Summer Intern
description: Increased productivity by doing 2 months of re-formatting & organizing of Creo archives in under a week.
Ensured product quality by performing safety checks on over 4,000 parts.
Made deliveries to clients sometimes multiple hours away, making each one on time.

work.title: Engineering Apprentice
description: Helped organize software development team by designing, building, and implementing a link management system with C# backend, HTML & CSS frontend, and XML storage which was used daily by the development team.

work.company: Windsor Crest Swim and Tennis Club
work.title: Lifeguard
description: Ensured the safety of swimmers by keeping watch.
Ensured the safety of the pools by performing chemical checks and balances multiple times per day.
